Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball's first shot sent the United Center into a frenzy after checking in during the first quarter.
Lonzo Ball made a beautiful cut to hit a reverse layup.
Lonzo Ball blocked Julius Randle and made a signature off-ball rotation to force a steal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lonzo Ball's return was significant for the basketball community as he had been out for over a thousand days with multiple injuries.
